#summary Description of the REST-like interface

= Introduction =

Apart from the SOAP interface, a simple REST interface is available, this page describes how to use it.

= Base URL =

The base url is:

{{{
http://[pathtobimserver]/rest
}}}

Adding ?_wadl to the base URL will give you a WADL document describing the available services.

= Example calls =

http://localhost:8082/rest/login?username=[username]&password=[password]

http://localhost:8082/rest/getAllProjects?expires=1289481543562&tokenstring=99AD8B9B29DA8C36C47FAEEED4C70041
